name: The Lost Dog (Chodex)
description:
Someone stole your dog! You have to find him! I mean it's your dog after all right?

NOTE: THIS GAME CONTAINS JUMP SCARES, LOUD NOISES...

A horror game made in about 3 months shows your love for your dog by trying to find him.

If you find any error, bug, etc... please leave a comment below.

Most of the music and sound effects in the game are made by me, while the other music and sound effects are cc0.

Controls:

-Move: W,A,S,D

-Sprint: Shift
